price: "tidak ada kematian, selain kematian di dunia ini.  Dan kami sekali-kali tidak akan dibangkitkan 1377,
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
footnotes: 1377.  Orang-orang musyrik Mekah mengingkari bahwa mati itu dua kali sebagaimana tersebut dalam ayat 28 Surah Al-Baqarah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
